original_title: Jimi Hendrix: The Road to Woodstock
overview: The definitive documentary record of one of Jimi Hendrix's most celebrated performances. It includes such signature songs as Purple Haze, Voodoo Child (Slight Return) and his rendition of the Star Spangled Banner, as well as interviews with Woodstock promoter Michael Lang and Hendrix band members Mitch Mitchell, Billy Cox, Larry Lee and Juma Sultan among others.
tagline: The definitive documentary record of one of Jimi Hendrix's most celebrated performances
title: Jimi Hendrix: The Road to Woodstock
